pk.Tools
Class Easel

java.lang.Object
  




public class Easel
extends Object

Easel class contains the BuffereImage which is used as the drawing area and all the drawing methods like line drawing rectangle drawing ,etc....

Version:
0.1.
Author:
Rahul B.
